messages.subject: New Unschooling Mama Intro
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone ! I am new to the group. My name is Tina and my family and I live in Florida on the outskirts of Orlando. I have a 5 yr old boy-Isaiah, an
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone ! I am new to the group. My name is Tina and my family
and I live in Florida on the outskirts of Orlando. I have a 5 yr old
boy-Isaiah, an almost 4 in 2 wks girl - Maya, an 18 mo boy-Ezra, and
am due with another girl on the 23rd of this month. We unschool and I
love it! We dont plan on changing things!
My husband and I have been married for 8 yrs and have done some
traveling in that time. My husband-Andy has his own business as a
subcontractor, he also does home remodeling and tile and stuff like
that. I am an artist. I do tattoos, murals,and make all kinds of
crafty things. We are really free people and have embraced the
unschooling method generously.
Were into natural everything, ap, alternative medicine-I am planning a
homebirth, meditation and yoga, my girl and I bellydance. We love to
camp. We love modern technology and are very open minded people!
Im looking forward to being part of this group! One Love!
